name: prettygit
description: Copy and paste git issues in a pretty format

scripts.compress: cd dist && zip -r prettygit-$(node -p -e "require('../package.json').version").zip ./* -x "*.DS_Store" && mv prettygit-$(node -p -e "require('../package.json').version").zip ../extension
scripts.version: npm run bump-manifest && npm run build && npm run compress && git add .

author: Cristian Macedo
